description: React component for the Inventory page, displaying stock data, and providing forms for receiving, issuing, and moving stock items. Uses React Query for data fetching and updates.

methods.name: Inventory
methods.description: React functional component rendering the inventory page, fetching stock data, and handling stock transactions (receive, issue, move).

methods.name: onReceive
methods.description: Async handler to process stock reception and refetch data.

methods.name: onIssue
methods.description: Async handler to process stock issue and refetch data.

methods.name: onMove
methods.description: Async handler to process stock movement and refetch data.
